pageContext.claim: “It is about time that Roger Goodell of the NFL is finally demanding that all players STAND for our great National Anthem-RESPECT OUR COUNTRY,”
pageContext.analysis: Trump insists the NFL Commissioner demands that players stand for the anthem, but following his tweet the NFL released a statement noting that Trump's commentary "about the Commissioner’s position on the Anthem is not accurate.” NFL players are encouraged but not required to stand.
